name: the eagle's nest
description:
This is a small experiment I've done so I could learn Unity. The missiles seek their targets with proportional navigation, the same algorithm real missiles of this type use.

How to play:

Pick up the missile launcher and destroy the aircraft flying overhead. Keep the center dot on the aircraft while aiming. Wait for the high-pitched tone to fire.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left click - Fire

Right click - Aim

Escape - Quit
